intro: Xanthocephalum ramulosum, commonly known as the slender everlasting or coastal everlasting, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its narrow, linear leaves and small yellowish flowers arranged in clusters. The plant is typically found in coastal and sandy soils, thriving in well-drained environments. It is often used in native gardens for its drought tolerance and ornamental value. Xanthocephalum ramulosum is also valued for its role in stabilizing dunes and preventing erosion in coastal areas.
